templates.template:
<xf:title>{{ $optionTitle }}</xf:title> <xf:selectrow name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$optionId}]" value="{$entry.choices|raw}" multiple="true" size="8" style="width: 350px" explain="{{ $optionExplain }}" label="{{ $optionTitle }}">
<xf:foreach loop="$entry.forum_list" key="$id" value="$forumName"> <xf:option value="{$id}">{$forumName}</xf:option> </xf:foreach> </xf:selectrow><xf:hiddenval name="options_listed[]">{$optionId}</xf:hiddenval>

<xf:title>{{ $optionTitle }}</xf:title> <xf:selectrow name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$optionId}]" value="{$entry.choices|raw}" multiple="true" size="8" style="width: 350px" explain="{{ $optionExplain }}" label="{{ $optionTitle }}">
<xf:foreach loop="$entry.group_list" key="$id" value="$groupName"> <xf:option value="{$id}">{$groupName}</xf:option> </xf:foreach> </xf:selectrow><xf:hiddenval name="options_listed[]">{$optionId}</xf:hiddenval>
